name: ezcord-utils-vsc
description: Hover + autocomplete for EzCord i18n keys from YAML language files.

ezcordUtils.languageFolderPath.description: Path to the folder containing language YAML files (e.g. bot/lang). Can be relative to the workspace root or an absolute path.

ezcordUtils.defaultLanguage.description: Primary language filename prefix to use (e.g. en for en.yaml).

ezcordUtils.fallbackLanguage.description: Fallback language filename prefix (e.g. en). Used if the key is missing in the default language.
